title: 94. [Ex Files] Trauma Bonds & Security in Relationships
description:
Hey sis!

This week we are kicking off the ex-files series where we explore how our trauma, limiting beliefs, and feelings of lack may be contributing to the types of relationship patterns we have been unknowingly welcoming in. This episode is a clip taken from a bonus video "Trauma, Security, & Prioritizing Your Needs" in my mini course, Heart Healing 101 which you can find here. Tune in to listen now!

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
